question: Is ustekinumab a polyclonal antibody?
ideal_answer: Ustekinumab is a human monoclonal IgG1 antibody targeting the p40-subunit shared by interleukin (IL)12 and IL-23.

snippets.text: Ustekinumab, a human monoclonal IgG1 antibody targeting the p40-subunit shared by interleukin (IL)12 and IL-23, represents a potential treatment for atopic dermatitis (AD).
